thread.title: David Walters
thread.title_full: Totally Wicked E-liquid USA inc. reviewed by David Walters

author: David Walters
title: David Walters
text: I ordered 6 of the IGO-W Plus RDA's, which were updated in Feb 2015. What I received on March 1, 2017 was 6 of the old versions of this tank, pre-2015. The product description did not inform me that these were old rda's, nor was there any distinction made when finalizing my order, or I would have cancelled. When I contacted the company, via email, to express my dissatisfaction, I was told "you paid clearance price. Send them back." Very poor attitudes and customer service. Will not buy from them ever again, and I suggest you don't either.
